definition.name: Toaster
definition.purpose: Display toast notifications with theme support
definition.description: A reusable toaster component that wraps the Sonner Toaster and applies the current theme from next-themes, along with custom CSS variables for background, text, and border colors.

properties.description: All props supported by the Sonner Toaster component (ToasterProps).

initial.data: No toasts are visible by default.

visible: Nothing, unless a toast is triggered.

when.description: A toast is triggered in the application.

visible: Toast notification with theme and custom styles

effects: A toast notification appears with the correct theme and custom styles.

when.description: The user dismisses a toast or it auto-closes.

definition.visualLayout: Toast notifications appear as overlays, styled according to the current theme and custom CSS variables.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses next-themes to detect the current theme and passes it to the Sonner Toaster. Customizes styles using CSS variables.
